name: Hetzner
description: Reliable European cloud provider specializing in affordable dedicated servers and cloud solutions.
longDescription: Hetzner is a leading European cloud and dedicated hosting provider offering reliable and cost-effective infrastructure solutions. With data centers primarily located in Germany and Finland, Hetzner ensures optimal data security, high availability, and full GDPR compliance. Its services include dedicated servers, cloud computing, managed Kubernetes clusters, storage solutions, and comprehensive networking capabilities.

productDetails.name: Dedicated Servers2
productDetails.description: High-quality dedicated servers for maximum performance and security.

productDetails.name: Hetzner Cloud
productDetails.description: Fast and scalable virtual servers with flexible resource allocation.

productDetails.name: Storage Boxes
productDetails.description: Robust and secure cloud storage solutions with high availability.

productDetails.name: Colocation
productDetails.description: Professional colocation services offering secure and reliable hosting environments.
